Canon Printer
Error 6000

Enter Printer Model


Factors of Canon Printer Error 6000

  • This dilemma arises if the printer’s paper feed tray stops the printer from opening if anything is blocked. That may be bits of dust or fragments of paper.
  • Canon Printer support code 6000 can also occur where the tray is not fitted into the tray correctly.
  • Also, when attempting to send multiple printer instructions at one time, this error can occur.
  • Often, when the printer is surrounded by several papers, it can also appear on the system.
  • The feed line is scratched or smoothed out.
  • This mistake also occurs when a sensor unit or in-line feed slit has any defect.

Canon Printer Error 6000 Set Solutions

Process 1. Cleaning of paper feed roller Procedure

Windows

  • Make sure your printer is enabled first of all. Delete from the rear tray, if there is any file.
  • Then open the dialogue on printer properties, which can differ based on your operating system.
  • Click the windows and X key from your keyboard first of all.
  • Type “Control Panel” and hit the Enter key in the search window.
  • Next pick “Printers and devices.”
  • As a consequence, the computer will display computers and printer windows.
  • Right-click on your printer listing and from the menu which appears, pick “Print Preferences.”
  • Click on the maintenance tab and then on the “Roller Cleaning” tab to solve the canon mx922 support code 6000.
  • You need to validate the message and click on the “Ok” tab afterward.
  • This rotates the paper feeding roller as it is washed.
  • Then, make sure the roller stops spinning on the paper feed. Then load three or four sheets of plain paper in A-4 size on the rear tray when the message arrives. The thickness level of the paper needs to be put right here.
  • The shown message is then confirmed and the button “Ok” is pressed.
  • This allows the paper mounted in the printer to feed and be thrown out of the printer. No other operations are advised during the cleaning of the paper feed roller.
  • Finally, the shown message must be confirmed and you must press “Ok.”

Switch off the printer, unplug the power plug while you still face this dilemma. Then clean the paper roller with the wet cotton swab on the right side of the rear tray. Then, when you wipe it, rotate the roll manually. Do not brush your fingertips on the paper feed roller, spin with your cotton swab.

Mac

  • Make sure your printer is enabled first of all. Delete from the rear tray, if there is any file.
  • Then the output channel is opened softly and the output channel expansion is opened.
  • Open the Canon Printer IJ operation afterwards.
  • To do this click on “print and fax,” open “System Preferences” After that, in Printer, pick the name of your printer, then press “Open Print Queue.” Then, in the product list, pick your printer name and then press “keep.”
  • You would then clean the roller of the paper feed. Make sure you pick cleaning in the pop-up menu. Click the “Roller Cleaning” button. Choose the root of the paper to disinfect. Click the “Ok” button next. The paper roller is then rotated during purification.
  • Then, make sure the roller stops spinning on the paper feed. Then load three or four sheets of plain paper in A-4 size on the rear tray when the message arrives. The thickness level of the paper needs to be put right here.
  • The shown message is then confirmed and the button “Ok” is pressed.
  • The paper loaded into the printer is then provided by the printer and maybe expelled. No other procedure should be done while the paper roller is washed.
  • Finally, the shown message needs to be confirmed, and click on the tab ‘Yes.’

Process 2

If the line feed is scratched or twisted, you just need to clean a non-corrosive solution with the LF or EJ slit film.

Process 3 

If the particles, dirt, or unusual object are trapped in the LF drive, correctly delete the jammed object.

Process 4. Removing Paper Work from the Print Queue

  • Next, press the keyboard windows and R keys in full.
  • Type “services.msc” in the Run box later. On the “Ok” tab, click.
  • This will allow you to view the service window. Here’s the print spooler you have to scroll down. Clicking on the “Stop” and right-clicking on it.
  • Click the windows and R keys on your keyboard again.
  • Type “spool” and click on “Ok” in the run box afterward.
  • Now type “% systemroot% System32 Spool” Printers and press the input key.
  • Next, by keeping a ctrl and A key, pick all the files.
  • To uninstall all files, click the “delete” key.
  • Then close the spool folder after removing all the files.
  • Return to the service window after that. Right-click on the folder “Switch Printing” and click on the button “Start.”

Process 5

This is the 5th method to fix the canon pixma support code 6000. Often, the printer’s capability may also be impaired by the faulty part. Therefore, to solve this issue, the faulty components must be replaced. LF and EJ slit film could be the faulty component of the printer. A timing sensor unit, the roller feeder unit, and the logic board may also be included.

Process 6. Reset The Printer System

  • Second, it’s important to separate your printer from the power switch. Leave in the same break mode for a few seconds.
  • And reconnect the printer’s power cord and reconnect it.
  • Then press the “Power” button and hold it for a couple of seconds. Then you have to double-click the “Stop” button.
  • Then one or two times you must repeat this process.
  • Now, the “Power” button has to be released very slowly this time.
  • Finally, four times you have to click on the “Stop” button.

Process 7

If your printer is surrounded by documents make sure before copying or printing you keep clear space in front of the tray. If the error message appears and something is in front of the box, delete it. Switch the printer off and then turn the printer off and back on, and the printer will be able to print.

Hence, these are complete steps to Solve the canon printer error code 6000.
